name: CW_ABST_VACCINATIONS
description: Vaccination information from abstractions with clinical information reported to the United States ESRD patient registry.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the registry data record.

columns.name: FLU_NOT_RECV_YN
columns.description: Shows whether the dialysis patient has received influenza vaccination or not.

columns.name: FLU_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description: The dialysis patient's influenza vaccination site.

columns.name: FLUE_DATE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's influenza vaccination date.

columns.name: PCV13_NOT_RECV_YN
columns.description: Shows whether the dialysis patient has received a PCV13 pneumococcal vaccination or not.

columns.name: PCV13_YEAR
columns.description: The dialysis patient's PCV13 pneumococcal vaccination year.

columns.name: PCV13_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description: Shows whether the dialysis patient's PCV13 pneumococcal vaccination was administered onsite or offsite.

columns.name: PPSV23_NOT_RECV_YN
columns.description: Shows whether the dialysis patient has received a PPSV23 pneumococcal vaccination or not.

columns.name: PPSV23_YEAR
columns.description: The dialysis patient's PPSV23 pneumococcal vaccination administration year.

columns.name: PPSV23_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description: Shows whether the dialysis patient's PPSV23 pneumococcal vaccination was administered onsite or offsite

columns.name: HEP_B_NOT_RECV_YN
columns.description: Shows whether the dialysis patient has received hepatitis B vaccination or not.

columns.name: HEP_B_FIRST_DATE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's hepatitis B vaccination first dose administration date.

columns.name: HEP_B_SECOND_DATE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's hepatitis B vaccination second dose administration date.

columns.name: HEP_B_THIRD_DATE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's hepatitis B vaccination third dose administration date.

columns.name: HEP_B_FOURTH_DATE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's hepatitis B vaccination fourth dose administration date.

columns.name: HEP_B_FIRST_BOOSTER_DATE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's hepatitis B vaccination booster 1 administration date.

columns.name: HEP_B_SECOND_BOOSTER_DATE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's hepatitis B vaccination booster 2 administration date.

columns.name: HEP_B_THIRD_BOOSTER_DATE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's hepatitis B vaccination booster 3 administration date.

columns.name: HEP_B_FOURTH_BOOSTER_DATE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's hepatitis B vaccination booster 4 administration date.

columns.name: HEP_B_NOT_RECV_MED_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: The dialysis patient's hepatitis B vaccination not received medical reason.

columns.name: HEP_B_NOT_RECV_PAT_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: The dialysis patient's hepatitis B vaccination not received non-medical reason.

columns.name: HEP_B_SURFACE_ANTIBODIES_VALUE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's hepatitis B antibodies test value.

columns.name: HEP_B_SURFACE_ANTIBODIES_DATE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's hepatitis B antibodies test date.
